document_data.caption: A trident of warning.
document_data.name: ''Warning''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Warning''''' is a [[weapon quality|quality]] that can be applied to magical weapons, making it so the wielder is not at a disadvantage if taken by surprise in battle.
document_data.Powers: Wielders of a ''weapon of warning'' could not be surprised and were able to act with greater initiative in battle. Such a weapon could further awaken its owner and their companions if fighting started nearby.
document_data.Notable Weapons of Warning: *''[[Auspex]]'' was a ''[[longsword]] of warning'' kept at the [[House of Thalivar]] by the [[Neverwinter]] garrison occupying [[Leilon]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name="D&DEK.DC>
